channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Mississippi’s new PSC energized by nuclear power, tepid over renewables
item.description: As the world looks towards alternative energy forms to balance an increased demand with the need to limit carbon emissions, the Mississippi’s new Public Service Commission is hoping to move the state ahead of the curve with nuclear power.

item.title: Indiana woman whose infant was disfigured in a rat attack gets probation
item.description: An Indiana woman who pleaded guilty to neglect for a rat attack that left her 6-month-old son with disfiguring injuries has been sentenced to probation.

item.title: Death of soldier at Missouri Army base under investigation as a homicide
item.description: A person of interest is in custody in connection with the death of a soldier stationed at Fort Leonard Wood in south-central Missouri. The body of Sgt.
